name: Minecrawler (AustinArtinger)
description:
In Minecrawler, you take on the role of an adrenaline-seeking explorer who delves into abandoned mines. As you descend into the Vena Próspera mine, the events of the past start playing out before your eyes. Corporate conspiracies, betrayals, and supernatural elements collide 577 feet below ground. Will you change the past, seek out the treasures of a forgotten time, or watch history repeat itself?

Minecrawler features 14 different endings through a text-based, choose-your-own-adventure style, Twine game.
